design_strategy.theme: Golden Heritage - Modern Luxury meets Chinatown Nostalgia
design_strategy.personality: The sophisticated grandmother who bakes the best tarts in the world but lives in a modern penthouse.

palette.primary_desc: Lacquer Red - Deep, rich, heritage-focused. NOT bright signal red.
palette.secondary_desc: Pastry Gold - The color of a perfect egg tart crust.
palette.background_desc: Steamed Bun White - Warm off-white/cream. NEVER pure white #FFFFFF.
palette.surface_desc: Warm Beige - For cards and sections.
palette.text_main_desc: Oolong Tea - Dark warm grey/brown. Softer than black.
palette.accent_green_desc: Jade Green - For subtle natural touches.

layout_system.spacing: Generous. Use p-12 to p-24 for section padding.
rules: No symmetry in the Hero section.
Overlap images and text slightly to create depth.
Use negative space to let the food photography breathe.

buttons.primary: bg-[#8B1E1E] text-[#F9F7F2] rounded-full px-8 py-4 hover:bg-[#6B1616] transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 font-serif tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-[#8B1E1E] text-[#8B1E1E] bg-transparent rounded-full px-8 py-4 hover:bg-[#8B1E1E] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300

cards.product: bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-500 group

navigation.classes: fixed top-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-[#F9F7F2]/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 shadow-lg z-50 flex gap-8 items-center

animations.scroll_parallax: Images move slower than text (y: -50 to 50)
animations.text_highlight: Gold underline draws itself on scroll

assets.icons: Lucide React (Use thin strokes for elegance)

page_structure.content: Headline: 'The Legend of San Francisco'. Sub: 'Hand-crafted egg tarts since 19xx'. CTA: 'View Menu'. Background: Hero Image.
History of the bakery, Chinatown context. Use 'Chinatown Lanterns' image with parallax.
Highlight Egg Tarts (Large), Moon Cakes (Medium), Pork Buns (Small). Use 'Products' images.
1029 Grant Ave. Live Status Indicator. Hours: 8AM-8PM. Map integration.
Customer reviews in elegant serif typography cards.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: framer-motion, lenis, lucide-react, clsx, tailwind-merge
SETUP: Configure Tailwind with the custom colors defined in 'colors' section.
FONTS: Import Playfair Display and Manrope from Google Fonts in index.css.
CRITICAL: Do not use standard Shadcn cards. Build custom 'product cards' with the hover effects described.
CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Lacquer Red' is used sparingly as an accent, not a background color (except maybe footer).
CRITICAL: The 'Egg Tart' image is the hero. Make it look delicious.
NAV: Create the floating navigation bar as specified in components.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered text blocks.
Use 2x padding than you think is necessary.
Dark colors for text, never pure black.
Respect the 'Golden Heritage' theme - it's not just a bakery, it's a landmark.
